snippet: Pope Francis highlighted Paraguay’s history to emphasize its resilience, but also criticized corruption, a delicate issue in one of Latin America’s poorest countries.
abstract: Pope Francis, speaking in Paraguay during Latin American tour, points out two important episodes in country's history as examples of its resilience; also urges Paraguayans to battle corruption.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis highlighted Paraguay’s history to emphasize its resilience, but also criticized corruption, a delicate issue in one of Latin America’s poorest countries.

headline.main: As Latin Tour Nears End, Pope Travels to Paraguay
headline.print_headline: As Latin Tour Nears End, Pope Travels to Paraguay
